bypassWorkflowCmdDescription: Scan for bypassers in workflow rules
bypassValidRulesCmdDescription: Scan for bypassers in validation rules
objectFilterFlagDescript: search in specified objects. Separate by comma if many
bypasserNameFlagDescript: specify the bypasser's custom setting object API name to search
bypassResultsMsg: There are %INVALID%/%ACTIVE% active, non-managed, %METADATA% without bypassers.
